p: The essential oils extracted by hydrodistillation from the aerial parts of H. officinalis subsp. aristatus were light yellow and showed a yield from 0.28 to 0.70% ( Table 1), similar to that reported by other authors respectively of 0.6–1.1% by Venditti et al. [ 6], 0.24–2.0% by Hajdari et al. [ 12], 0.6% by Džamić et al. [ 14].
